list.description:
Simple Sight for the AML 90. Works with the Eland 90 too.

#aml90 #eland_mk_7

BMP 2 Sight, inspired by GHPC. Orange Colour is default. You can change it in the file if you dont like, just change crosshaircolor and crosshairlightcolor.

#bmp_2

My BMP 1 Sight. Works for the german BMP as well. Inspired by the Sight in GHPC.

Leave a Comment if you like it. I also have a Sight for BMP 2 and the new BTR 80a

*Changed the Coloursetting slighty

#historical #bmp1

New Version of my BTR-82A(TKN-4GA-02) Sight together with my BTR-80A(1PZ-9) Sight. Both for the USSR BTR-80A ingame.

#historical #btr #btr_80a

Sight for Seniors.
First run. Working on more. Larger detail. You can put in all tanks folder and it will show up for all tanks.
Maybe check my profile for more fun stuff and leave a comment if you like.
Thanks

Realistic sight for french VBCI (MCT30)

12-18-2023 : UPDATE => minor adjustement on central reticle (more precise values of reticle's dimension)

Zip folder contain:
fr_vbci2_mct30 folder
Realistic sight for VBCI.

Adapted for on WT:
-display distance correction are not at correct scale, subsequent update for that when i find the correct commands.
-Informations and situations on the sight are dynamic in the real optic. i did the choice fix them in a situation.

For install, look that tutoriel (English or french)
https://forum.warthund...

These are the sights I use. There are two versions. One for high velocity guns. Another for low velocity. The sights are universal, which means they can be used with any vehicle. Just download the zip file and unzip it into your main War Thunder directory.

Custom Sights for US Vehicles.

Hi War Thunder players,
This is a package sight for rank VII + VIII USSR included finish and unfinish sights. I upload them just for testing, so if they have any bugs, please tell me and I'll try to fix them.
Rank I - VII sights have some problem about the FOV after major update released, so I won't post them all now. So sorry~~
If you have any problems with my sights, please contact me and I'll try to support you!
Discord: https://discord.gg/eYNEdrEyrE
Enjoy and have good days!!!

* Note:
- My TV sights only work normally in 1080p :(

The 2s25 gunner Telescopic sight based on ARMA3 rhsafrf mod
The scales on both sides are HEAT, and the one with the center to the left is APFSDS. The middle one cannot be the same as the scale in the game for restoration purposes.

I am back with a New Sight that works on all tanks.
Same Character as the previous Sight (Asuka Langley) but this time in the Swiming Suit.
If you wonder where i got the Image, i got it from a friend (i bet its from r34)
Anyways, if you want to request any Sights, you can leave a comment here or add me on Discord ,,average romania troll 6584"

#anime #azur #lane #azurlane #shinano #shinanowangywangy

#t72m1

Semi-original sight for swedish T72-m1.
The original sight is from another pack of sights. (sorry i don't remember the name of the player who created the orginal sight, but you can search sights for swedish tanks)
I turned the color sight to green for night battle because the light red was too bright.
I modified the letter of "MG" and "OF" (High Explosive) from cyrillic to latin and add rangefinder.

#m1a2_abrams #m1a2sep_abrams

US - M1A2 / SEP Sight
Zoom: 3.0x-10.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\us_m1a2_abrams

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\us_m1a2_abrams

Thank You for Downloading my Custom Sight, in the Folder are 4 Files, 3 of which are sights with different sizes that end in .BLK while the other one is the file from SketchUp that can be modified there
For more Custom Sights, you can either Request it or make it yourself by using this Tutorial (not mine)
https://youtu.be/xvvTipG9_Ms

KorEEnium's historical Tiger optics have been updated, including the H1 and E models, fixing the FOV and ranging issues in version 2.03. You can find the original post at https://live.warthunder.com/post/676037/en/.
